phrases: My little sister, Umaru, is renowned for her beauty.
Yeah, that is enough of that.
I will be back tomorrow night.
But it is your day off!
This is why you are a corporate slave to a wicked company that steals your soul.
Our deadline's right around the corner.
Also, I will get some time off in exchange.
Summer vacation's over, so even though I will not be around, you better not stay up too late.
I am free, FREE I say!
My night is just getting started!
Big Brother always goes to sleep before midnight, so...
Go to bed already, or I will not be able to wake up tomorrow!
But this is the time to burn through all my games!
I just never seem to have enough time!
I am going to wake up Big Brother!
He always gets mad, so I just acted out of reflex.
Do you know what time it is?!
Stop eating cup noodles so late at night!
Do not drink all the soup!
Late-night potato chips and cola sure hit the spot!
It is late, so keep your voice down!
But now, no one can get mad at me.
I have everything in the palm of my hand!
Today, Umaru shall be held down by NO ONE!
This is a world where nights are long and glorious!
But, I thought it was 1:00 AM!
Sure enough, time flies at this hour.
Time to check what late-night anime are on!
I stayed up late, so I slept in more than usual!
I thought if I went out, I could get back some of what I would burned through.
It is dangerous to be out at night.
Hurry up and get back inside!
I am not sure what is going on, but...
What are you talking about, Big Brother?
Well, the landlord might find that a little strange.
Like, Umaru is such a nice girl, so I thought for sure she would come.
My, I am glad to see some youngsters showing up.
As you can see, my back is giving me some problems...
Okay, Big Brother... let us go home.
There are not even that many of them.
So you are here too, huh?
You have already pulled all those?
Well, back home in Akita, reckon I... I mean, I am used to this!
You are a world apart from Umaru...
Anyway, I am glad you are both here.
Honestly, I was a little lonely on my own.
Looks like it is hard for her to go running off now.
Say, why do not we do this together?
Um... so, should I cut these with a sickle?
I think it would be best to pull them by hand.
You have to pull them by the roots or else they will grow back.
That must be the middle boss!
Sorry for dragging out here in this heat.
You are not hurt, are you?
I can do this a little longer.
We finished up pretty fast, huh?
It feels like we have really done something here.
Ebina, your face is all red.
Well, how about we all treat ourselves by getting something cold to eat?
My school shall be holding it this month.
This is why I must practice!
What was that move just now?!
It is just something I do at home sometimes, the Potato Catch...
You are quite good at ball games, yes?
Sylphyn and I are always battling each other, but the soccer match will be class vs. class.
This might make it easier to talk to her at school.
You think you can keep up with my training regimen?
Is commonly used in martial arts circles as a way of not only agreeing, but to also show determination.
Instead, see the trajectory of where the ball is GOING.
Mentality is a big part of sports.
You have to visualize you have already won.
When you take your shot, the ball should spin like a bullet...
like you are blasting it with a laser!
The ball is your best friend...
Save your stamina for when you will need it.
Take some breaks during the game.
But if I rest, I will have points detracted.
Just take your break and trust in the others!
I wanted to be at the same school, in the same class as you, UMR.
Th-the people in your class are good at soccer too.
Now take what I have taught you and go WIN!
So, these are the uniforms we will all be wearing...
I will protect Umaru... I will protect Umaru... I WILL protect Umaru!
I am not feeling very confident.
I wish I was on the same team as you.
All right, let us get this match underway!
Most of them are not even in our class!
They split up our classes when they were making the teams.
The students were getting too fired up about it being class vs. class, so they scrapped the idea.
They tried to balance out the teams, and made the person with the best grades in PE the leader.
The person with the best grades is the leader?
Your leader has not gotten here yet?
She is standing on some balls and sliding around on them?!
It is like she is water skiing!
It is through soccer that I shall defeat Umaru!
Okay, it looks like it is almost time for kickoff.
This match will be between Arayada High's Team T...
See the trajectory of where the ball is GOING.
Her form is all over the place, but her power is remarkable!
Kirie has changed the ball's trajectory and sent it straight to Umaru.
Okay, we are on the offensive!
I wanted to fight alongside Sylphyn,
I am going to give this all I have got!
Umaru and Sylphyn are locked in a heated battle!
I am not sure what the caption at the bottom there means, but is that a universe I see forming?!
I have had to deal with so many surprises that now I feel weak!
The first point of the game goes to Team T!
Sylphyn pulled it off all on her own, and despite how far she ran, she is not breathing heavy at all!
That play just now took a lot out of me.
Regardless, I must score another point!
Team YOU has rallied around Umaru and is holding their own against Team T!
Meanwhile, Sylphyn has turned Team T into a one-man show!
This shot has given the ball a strange gyration!
Yeah, I would never seen anything like it.
Normally, a ball strikes and then rebounds like this, right?
The ball hit a sort of soft obstruction, resulting in a motion nothing short of miraculous.
No one could have predicted what the ball would do next!
It scored a picture-perfect goal against Team T.
That is as good as any!
It is not good at all!
I shall not allow you to score!
What turn of events is this?
Team YOU is starting to pick up the pace!
How can the other team keep this up?
Yes, they are in the zone!
Team YOU has reached that ultimate state of focus known as the zone!
(For more about this zone, please see whichever sports manga is applicable.)
How can there be such a difference between our teams?
At this rate, defeat is certain!
I practiced so hard, and even received instruction from... UMR!
Cover Sakura a bit so she can rest.
Suddenly, they are moving a lot more coordinated!
Team YOU came from behind for the win!
How did you fire off that Bullet Shot?
You scored two points against Umaru's team, and that is amazing!
Plus, your coaching in the second half was fantastic!
You even remembered all our names, right?
And so, the soccer match came to a close...
We will be having a volleyball tournament soon.
I certainly hope we can train together again!
Let us all walk home together!
Y-you are that girl from the class next door, uh...
I do not even know you, so stop talking like you are my friend!
C'mon, do not sweat the details!
Haruka is always making friends with that dazzling smile of hers.
Making friends with a simple greeting like that sure would make things easier, huh?
But, I mean, it is what it is, right?
Even asking someone to hang out is way too much pressure!
What if you ask and they say no?
You will be heartbroken, and you will not even have a friend!
Say, let us walk home together!
You are being WAY too dramatic!
If that sort of thing holds you back, you will just regret it later.
Did you have lots of friends?
Kirie, you and Umaru made some awesome combo plays at the soccer match!
N-no, I would not say that...
Sylphyn, do you understand this question?
It seems like people are talking to Kirie and Sylphyn a lot more after the soccer match...
Maybe I should try talking to people too.
I-I am embarrassed for some reason.
Also... what would I do if they are not interested?
I have always been the one that other people talk to first...
I wonder if Kirie has club activities...
She was not in her class, so I think so.
Maybe if I joined a club, I could get good at sports like you.
Are you thinking about the soccer match?
Still, Sylphyn was kind enough to pass the ball to me.
It was a lot of fun!
I thought about talking to Sylphyn after that, but she said she had to talk to a friend and just left.
Ebina, you have asked Kirie to have lunch with you before, right?
Were not you afraid she would say No?
I was embarrassed and a little unsure...
But I felt I would regret it if I did not try!
Our tests are coming up, so...!
Um, they are cleaning the pool today, so club activities are...!
Say, how about the four of us walk home together?
Y-you certainly are asking a lot.
B-but, fine, I have no objections!
What do you say we get some crepes?
Our anime has started up again!
I did not expect you to be so calm...
You are the one who needs to relax.
